name: SUMA_FSvolToBRIK
author: FreeSurfer Development Team
description: A script to convert COR- or .mgz files from FreeSurfer to BRIK format

inputs.description: Input FreeSurfer volume data (e.g. COR- images or .mgz volume)
inputs.name: FreeSurfer Volume Data

output-files.description: Output BRIK volume converted from FreeSurfer data
output-files.name: Output BRIK file

output-files.description: Header file for the output BRIK volume
output-files.name: Output HEAD file
